name: Adult Diaper
description:
We are appealing for donations of adult diapers (Size M, any brand) for a 29-year-old with special needs.

The family of five is currently staying in a 2-room rental flat and facing financial constraints. Any contribution of diapers will help to ease their daily challenges and reduce their financial burden.

passiton.name: Adult open diapers brand new
passiton.description:
Brand new adult open diapers.
12 packets in total.
WhatsApp me if keen. Will respond adap.

name: Tablet
description: Client is a single mother to her teenage daughter and also taking care of her elderly mother in a low income household. Client is working full-time and recently decided to take a part-time diploma on weeknights to upskill herself. She requires a tablet, preferably with a smart pen, to aid in her studying. Please Whatsapp me at 62319407 if you have a suitable one to donate. Thank you!

passiton.name: Donation of Solid Wood Sofa Set (3+1+1) – Jurong East
passiton.description:
I would like to bless and donate a solid wood sofa set (3-seater + two 1-seaters) in good, usable condition through the Pass-It-On programme.

Item details:

Origin: Zen Tradition

Material: Solid, heavy wood with firm cushion seats

Condition: Gently used, structurally strong, minor wear on fabric edges

Includes: Main seat cushions only (small decorative cushions in photo not included)

Colour: Beige-gold fabric with dark wood frame. I will also include an additional spare set of cushion covers in red too

Quantity: 1 set (3 + 1 + 1)


Pickup details:

Location: Jurong East (lift accessible)

Preferred collection: By end of Oct (flexible on timing)

I can assist with coordination for movers or charity pickup. By the way, need to arrange for movers because only my elderly parents in the house.

passiton.name: Grey fabric 2.5 seater sofa
passiton.description: Lightly used sofa. Fabric and oak frame. Backrest and seats covers are removable for washing
passiton.location: Amber Road, East Coast, Joo Chiat, Katong, Marine Parade, Meyer, Tanjong Rhu
